content: Yes, I am aware of the comic strip Calvin and Hobbes. Calvin and Hobbes is a popular comic strip that was created by Bill Watterson and was published in newspapers from 1985 to 1995. The strip follows the adventures of Calvin, a mischievous and imaginative six-year-old boy, and his stuffed tiger Hobbes, who Calvin sees as being alive. The strip is known for its humor, intelligence, and philosophical themes, and has a wide following around the world. Do you have any other questions about Calvin and Hobbes?
